page.title: 05INDUSTRIES AND FACTORIES.
page.content: In Narborough there are lots of factories,most of which are warehouses. They are in groups on the edge of the village. There is Roger Clark's boat building factory. 35 men work there.He designs and makes small powered boats from glass fibre. There is a wooden building factory.It makes sheds,huts and greenhouses. Empire Stone is a big factory. It makes concrete products, ranging from garden ornaments to concrete panels.It has a cafeteria which people use for games and Brownies and other social events.
